name: AVAudioConverterPrimeMethod
desc: Options for the prime method property.

items.name: case pre
items.desc: An option to prime with leading and trailing input frames.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: An option to prime with trailing (zero latency) frames where the converter assumes the leading frames are silence.

items.name: case none
items.desc: An option to prime the converter assumes leading and trailing frames are silence.
